---
status: public
observed: "no"
shortDescription: "The else branch of an if-then-else block always executes"
shortCorrection: "The else branch of an if-then-else block only executes if the condition evaluates to false"
concepts:
  - Conditional
  - ControlFlow
related:
# - id: LiteralNoExpression
#   relation: Special case
inOtherPl:
  - pl: Java
    id: ElseAlwaysExecutes
# - pl: Python
#   id: ElseAlwaysExecutes
spec:
  - id: scratch3.0
    sections: ["wiki-If_()_Then,_Else_(block)", "wiki-Stack_Block"]
plVersion:
# from: jls8
# to: jls14
expressibleInNms:
  - id: ControlFlowAsGraph
    how: graph of an if-else statement
---

An `if-then-else` block is equivalent to a sequence of an `if-then` block
followed by the body of the else.

frontmatter.shortDescription: The else branch of an if-then-else block always executes
frontmatter.shortCorrection: The else branch of an if-then-else block only executes if the condition evaluates to false
